mn75:5.3: bhūnahuno → bhūnahanassa (s1-3, km), bhūnahu → bhūnahano (s1-3, km)
mn75:5.11: agaru āroceyyāmi taṃ → āroceyyametaṃ (bj, pts1) | ārocessāmi tassa (s1-3, km)
mn75:7.1: Ayañca hi → ayañca hidaṃ (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
mn75:10.7: paricārayamāno → paricāriyamāno (s1-3, pts1), tūriyehi → turiyehi (bj, s1-3, km, pts1), vassike cattāro → vassike pāsāde cattāro (s1-3, km)
mn75:17.2: tathā tathāssa → tathā tathā tasseva (s1-3, km, mr)
mn75:20.2: mañjiṭṭhakāni → mañjeṭṭhakāni (bj, mr) | mañjeṭṭhikāni (s1-3, km, pts1)
mn75:20.6: telamalikatena sāhuḷicīrena → telamasikatena sāhuḷacīvarena (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
